content:
TITLE: Using Rebrowser-Puppeteer with Puppeteer-Extra
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to integrate rebrowser-puppeteer with puppeteer-extra using the addExtra method. This allows for combining the benefits of both libraries.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
// before
import puppeteer from 'puppeteer-extra'

// after
import { addExtra } from 'puppeteer-extra'
import rebrowserPuppeteer from 'rebrowser-puppeteer-core'
const puppeteer = addExtra(rebrowserPuppeteer)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Patching Puppeteer-Core with Rebrowser Patches
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use npx to run the Rebrowser patches against an installed puppeteer-core library. This command applies the patches to improve automation transparency.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx rebrowser-patches@latest patch --packageName puppeteer-core
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Patching Custom Puppeteer-Core Installation
DESCRIPTION: Illustrates how to patch a custom installation of puppeteer-core by providing the full path to its folder. This is useful for non-standard package locations.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx rebrowser-patches@latest patch --packagePath /web/app/node_modules/puppeteer-core-custom
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Accessing Browser CDP Connection
DESCRIPTION: Example of using the patched _connection() method to access browser-level CDP session.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
browser._connection().on('Rebrowser.addRunEvent', (params) => { ... })
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Runtime Fix Mode in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting the Runtime.Enable fix mode via environment variable in JavaScript code.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
process.env.REBROWSER_PATCHES_RUNTIME_FIX_MODE = "alwaysIsolated"
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Reverting Rebrowser Patches for Puppeteer-Core
DESCRIPTION: Shows the command to revert all changes made by Rebrowser patches to the puppeteer-core library, restoring it to its original state.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx rebrowser-patches@latest unpatch --packageName puppeteer-core
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Runtime Fix Mode in Shell
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting the Runtime.Enable fix mode via environment variable in shell command.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
REBROWSER_PATCHES_RUNTIME_FIX_MODE=alwaysIsolated node app.js
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Custom Utility World Name
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting a custom utility world name via environment variable.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
REBROWSER_PATCHES_UTILITY_WORLD_NAME=customUtilityWorld
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Custom Source URL in Shell
DESCRIPTION: Example of setting a custom sourceURL for evaluated scripts via environment variable.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
REBROWSER_PATCHES_SOURCE_URL=jquery.min.js
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Utility World Name Environment Variable in Bash
DESCRIPTION: Sets an environment variable to disable the utility world name patch. This must be set before running the script as it's used during module import.
SOURCE: https://github.com/rebrowser/rebrowser-patches/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# use 0 to completely disable this patch
REBROWSER_PATCHES_UTILITY_WORLD_NAME=0
```
